channel.title: iClarity V1.05 - Perfect PvP/NvP combat; Halfway to V1.1
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/n17y4n.png[/img]
Welcome to iClarity.
This version of iClarity is between V1 and V1.1, as I haven't added/finished what I said I was going to add/finish in V1.1.
This version has several stability updates and less 'lag'.
In V1.1 all that I promised will be added/finished. This includes all the shops in Edgeville, warriors guild, a decent economy etc.
Server download: [url=http://uppit.com/v/R289ITB1]http://uppit.com/v/R289ITB1[/url] Mirror 1: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?nammjzxau1z Mirror 2: [url=http://www.MegaShare.com/1259338]http://www.MegaShare.com/1259338[/url] Mirror 3: [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=3OVNCKC3]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=3OVNCKC3[/url]
Client download: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?zvmziyvion0 Mirror 1: Uploading soon. Mirror 2: Uploading soon. Mirror 3: Uploading soon.
[U][B](¯`·._.· Server updates between V1 and V1.05 ·._.·´¯):[/B][/U]
[ul][li]Found and fixed a fault, which caused the server to take up a lot more Memory Usage than the server should do.[/li] [li]Fixed bug: Magic tabs.[/li] [li]Fixed bug: You couldn't see players after you died.[/li] [li]Fixed bug: Granite maul special attack.[/li] [li]Fixed bug: Wilderness skull not disappearing after leaving wilderness.[/li] [li]Fixed bug: NPC drops.[/li] [li]Fixed bug: Wilderness levels in duel arena.[/li] [li]Fixed bug: Client crashing.[/li] [li]Removed: Lunar interface.[/li] [li]Increased Stability; Uses 3x less CPU now.[/li] [li]Handled all packets.[/li] [li]Handled NPC combat.[/li] [li]Handled Leather Crafting.[/li] [li]Handled Minigames.[/li] [li]Fixed logging in glitch.[/li] [li]Removed a lot of unnecessary codes.[/li] [li]Based in Edgeville.[/li] [li]PvN magic.[/li] [li]Finished: Barrows.[/li] [li]Shops in edgeville include: Crafting shop, general store (All shops will be added in V1.1).[/li] [li]Crafting added. Includes Full leather crafting (Gem cutting & amulet creation will be added in V1.1).[/li] [li]Full skulling added: You attack someone, you skull; they attack you back, they don't skull. You also lose all items if you are skulled and you don't have protect item on, if you die.[/li] [li]More use of events, and less 'processing' used.[/li] [li]Tzhaar NPC teleports you to fight cave entrance.[/li] [li]Warrior in edgeville (Is going to be used for teleportation to the warriors guild, and the skillcape shop).[/li] [li]Vannaka (Slayer master) in edgeville will give you tasks, and has the slayer shop.[/li] [li]Find the rest for yourself.[/li][/ul]
There haven't really been any client updates since V1, apart from a skulling fix, and a few other minor things. I suggest you download the new client.
[B][U]FAQ:[/U][/B]
Q: How do I edit the client's IP? A: The 'getCodeBase' method in client.java.
Q: When will V1.1 be released? A: I don't fucking know, stop asking me.
Q: How do I enable the client with my server/enable my server to use with your client? A: PM me and I will PM you back with a short tutorial on how to do it.
[B][U]Pictures/Videos:[/U][/B]
Barrows: LQ - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pf563Xaqbo4]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pf563Xaqbo4[/url] HQ - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pf563Xaqbo4&fmt=18]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pf563Xaqbo4&fmt=18[/url]
Fight cave: Ket-Zeks (360s) and Tzok-jad - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sxZFroKTB6k]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sxZFroKTB6k[/url] Tok-Xils (90s) - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3D1TT33czeM]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3D1TT33czeM[/url]
PvN magic/Autocasting: LQ - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mJhk2KYs0F0]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mJhk2KYs0F0[/url] HQ - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mJhk2KYs0F0&fmt=18]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mJhk2KYs0F0&fmt=18[/url]

[IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww4/primadude12/Ddsspecial.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww4/primadude12/Projectiles.gif[/img]

item.title: iClarity V1.05 - Perfect PvP/NvP combat; Halfway to V1.1
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

masterkorv12:

How do i add all emotes like yes, no , zombie dance etc, cause they are removed and doesnt work?

In the ‘ActionButtons’ class, add a case within the switch-statement in the ‘processPacket’ method. E.G:

case ####: setAnimation(####); break;

Read full topic
